definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: The paper discusses how to construct teaching system of cadastral surveying and mapping.
sentences.chinese: 對構建和完善地籍測量教學體系進行初步探討和研究。

sentences.english: The spatial information update is an important work in cadastral management information system.
sentences.chinese: 空間信息的更新是地籍管理信息系統中一項重要內容。

sentences.english: It is necessary to enhance the system construction and renewedly understand the cadastral management system.
sentences.chinese: 加強制度建設，重新認識地籍管理制度是非常必要的。

sentences.english: Cadastral survey by the Hanjiang commissioned by the Land Management Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 地籍調查工作由邗江區國土管理分局委託。

sentences.english: Finally, this change in membership for the investigation of the check methods.
sentences.chinese: 最後是針對本次變更地籍調查工作的驗收辦法。

sentences.english: In addition, the attribute information of Cadastre entity would be also designed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還設計了地籍實體的屬性信息。

sentences.english: Its management must be based on the management of land possession.
sentences.chinese: 林地管理必須以地籍管理爲基礎。

sentences.english: Article 20 The register and the cadastral map shall be permanently retained by the registry.
sentences.chinese: 第20條登記簿及地籍圖由登記機關永久保存之。

definition: boundary (of a piece of land or territory)
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
